table.column: , 20535, After all functions are compiled and linked into a single design
, , After user unroll and inline pragmas are applied
(1) unroll, 455704 *, user unroll pragmas are applied
(2) simplification, 169421 *, simplification of applied user unroll pragmas
(3) inline, 150362 *, user inline pragmas are applied
(4) simplification, 147351 *, simplification of applied user inline pragmas
, , After user array partition and struct aggregate/disaggregate pragmas are applied
(1) array partition, 134063 *, user array partition pragmas are applied
(2) simplification, 107282 *, simplification of applied user array partition & struct aggregate/disaggregate pragmas
(3) aggregate/disaggregate , 107282 *, user struct aggregate/disaggregate pragmas are applied
(4) array reshape, 107954 *, apply array reshape pragmas
(5) access patterns, 106946 *, array access pattern optmizations
, , After transformations are applied to meet performance pragma targets
(1) loop simplification, 106890 *, loop and instruction simplification
(2) parallelization, 104953 *, loops are unrolled or pipelined to meet performance targets
(3) array partition, 104937 *, arrays are partitioned to meet performance targets
(4) simplification, 104105 *, simplification of design after performance transformations
, , After hardware transfomations
(1) lowering, 104114 *, initial conversion to HW specific instructions
(2) optimizations, 104132 *, high level synthesis optimizations
